name: Accion Connect
description: Integrated platform that breaks down information silos across Accion Labs, providing a unified view of people, projects, and knowledge. Connects enterprise systems including HRMS, Document Repositories, Website CMS, and Billing Platforms to streamline discovery, collaboration, and delivery.
businessValue: Enables faster discovery of content and expertise, higher confidence through AI-assisted answers with citations, and greater productivity through auto-drafted content and omnichannel access.

keyFeatures.name: GenAI-Powered Semantic Search
keyFeatures.description: Unified search across documents and profiles with citations, historic chat context, and document-specific conversations
keyFeatures.businessValue: Find relevant content and people in seconds with trusted, auditable AI responses

keyFeatures.name: People & Skills Graph
keyFeatures.description: Real-time synchronized engineer profiles and skills globally with bidirectional sync
keyFeatures.businessValue: Quickly identify and form teams based on specific skills and expertise

keyFeatures.name: Knowledge Base Integration
keyFeatures.description: Comprehensive repository of case studies, white papers, presentations, sales collateral, and marketing brochures
keyFeatures.businessValue: Preserve institutional knowledge and enable efficient knowledge sharing

keyFeatures.name: Dynamic Content Workbench
keyFeatures.description: AI-powered content generation with multiple output formats (PDF, Markdown, HTML) and tone/audience controls
keyFeatures.businessValue: Accelerate content creation with AI assistance while maintaining quality through human approval

keyFeatures.name: Omnichannel Access
keyFeatures.description: Seamless access via WhatsApp, Microsoft Teams, and web interface
keyFeatures.businessValue: Enable knowledge access from any channel, reducing time from query to action

keyFeatures.name: FAQ-First Q&A System
keyFeatures.description: Curated FAQ responses with fallback to semantic search and auto-suggestions
keyFeatures.businessValue: Provide instant, accurate answers to common questions while maintaining consistency

technicalCapabilities: In-browser historic chat with context retention

integrations.purpose: Mobile instant answers and knowledge access

securityFeatures: Role-based access controls for internal and guest users
AI answer source linking for compliance and trust
Secure one-time links with configurable expiry

metrics: User logins by company and geography
analytics.governance: Complete audit trails with citations for compliance

useCases: Employee skill discovery and team formation
Knowledge sharing and institutional memory preservation
benefits: Faster discovery - Find content and people in seconds
Higher confidence - Citations and audit trails foster trust
Greater productivity - Auto-drafted content and in-channel access
Unified information access - Break down enterprise silos
Enhanced collaboration - Seamless integration across platforms
Reduced time to action - Instant answers in preferred channels
